message_1: Suppose a system creates a new process every 5 seconds and terminates a process every 10 seconds. At time 0, the system has no processes running. How many processes will be running at time 30?
message_2:
Let's break down the problem into intervals of 5 seconds:

At time 5 seconds, 1 process is created (1 process running).

At time 10 seconds, 1 process is created and 1 process is terminated (1 - 1 = 0 processes running).

At time 15 seconds, 1 process is created (1 process running).

At time 20 seconds, 1 process is created and 1 process is terminated (1 - 1 = 0 processes running).

At time 25 seconds, 1 process is created (1 process running).

At time 30 seconds, 1 process is created and 1 process is terminated (1 - 1 = 0 processes running).

So, at time 30 seconds, there will be 0 processes running.
